name: Cubes No Stress
description:
Welcome to the anti-stress sandbox game "Cubes No Stress"! In this funny game you can build various structures from cubes and destroy them in different ways! You can build a tower and demolish it with the Destroyer Ball! You can build a pyramid and smash it by causing an earthquake by spamming the "C" button! Alternatively, you can simply break the floor and your building will fall into the ground! This game will help you relax. Enjoy!

Equinox by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com/ Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/ Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-SA 3.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
